title: Bug 118780: Alias name not displayed correctly in Expression Builder for columns in dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the original column name is displayed instead of the alias name.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking on the first column name, the alias name should be displayed. Instead, the original name of the column is displayed below the expression builder, while the alias name appears above as row["column1"] after double-clicking the original name.
SR: 1. Open the expression builder. 2. Select a dataset. 3. Double-click on the first column name. 4. Observe that the original column name is displayed below the expression builder, instead of the alias name.
